code: import _classCallCheck from"@babel/runtime/helpers/classCallCheck";import{TweenMax}from'gsap';import{CubeGeometry,Group,Mesh,MeshPhongMaterial}from'three';var size=0.1;var Feathers=function Feathers(){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,Feathers);this.waterMat=new MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xffffff,flatShading:true});this.mesh=new Group();this.run=function(type,direction){var explosionSpeed=0.3;var removeParticle=function removeParticle(p){p.visible=false;};for(var i=0;i<_this.parts.length;i++){var m=direction<0?-1:1;var tx=(Math.random()*5.0+2)*m;var ty=Math.random()*2.0+1;var tz=Math.random()*2.0+1;var p=_this.parts[i];var bezier={type:'cubic',values:[{x:0,y:0,z:0},{x:tx*0.25,y:ty*0.25,z:tz*0.25},{x:tx*0.5,y:ty*0.5,z:tz*0.5},{x:tx,y:ty,z:tz}],curviness:3};p.position.set(0,0,0);p.scale.set(1,1,1);p.visible=true;var delay=explosionSpeed+Math.random()*0.5;TweenMax.to(p.position,delay*5,{bezier:bezier});TweenMax.to(p.rotation,delay*5,{z:Math.random()*(Math.PI*2)+0.2,x:Math.random()*(Math.PI*2)+0.2,y:Math.random()*(Math.PI*2)+0.2,delay:delay});var scaleTo=0.01;TweenMax.to(p.scale,delay,{x:scaleTo,y:scaleTo,z:scaleTo,onComplete:removeParticle,onCompleteParams:[p],delay:delay*3});}};var bigParticleGeom=new CubeGeometry(size,size,0.01,1);this.parts=[];for(var i=0;i<20;i++){var partPink=new Mesh(bigParticleGeom,this.waterMat);this.parts.push(partPink);this.mesh.add(partPink);}};export{Feathers as default};
